description: PO table with expand/collapse, selection, and status indicators

behavioral_assertions.requirement: Component MUST render all PO data in table format
behavioral_assertions.validation: Unit test: verify all PO fields rendered

behavioral_assertions.requirement: Expand/collapse MUST toggle line item visibility
behavioral_assertions.validation: Unit test: click expand, verify line items visible

behavioral_assertions.requirement: Row selection MUST highlight selected row
behavioral_assertions.validation: Unit test: click row, verify bg-accent/10 class

behavioral_assertions.requirement: Select all checkbox MUST select/deselect all POs
behavioral_assertions.validation: Unit test: click select-all, verify callback called with all IDs

behavioral_assertions.requirement: Indeterminate checkbox state MUST show when some selected
behavioral_assertions.validation: Unit test: select 1 of 3, verify checkbox.indeterminate === true

behavioral_assertions.requirement: Currency formatting MUST use AUD with no decimals
Date formatting MUST use DD MMM YYYY format
Mapping status badge MUST show green when fully mapped
behavioral_assertions.validation: Unit test: mapped_count === total_line_items shows green

behavioral_assertions.requirement: FMT PO badge MUST show blue 'Yes' or gray 'No'
behavioral_assertions.validation: Unit test: verify badge color based on fmt_po boolean

behavioral_assertions.requirement: Checkbox clicks MUST not propagate to row click
behavioral_assertions.validation: Unit test: click checkbox, verify onPOSelect NOT called

notes: Presentation Cell - receives data via props. Critical fixes: HTMLInputElement type safety (line 159), removed duplicate interfaces.
